languages.text: "Леттард заслуживал смерти, я не буду наказывать Кибеллу за это убийство. Практики же его отныне на корабле запрещены".

traits.locale_text: "Леттард Фориус, твои опыты невозможно оправдать благими намерениями. Я признаю Кибеллу невиновной".

languages.text: "Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."
languages.original_text: "Леттард заслуживал смерти, я не буду наказывать Кибеллу за это убийство. Практики же его отныне на корабле запрещены".

traits.locale_text: "Lettard deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibella for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."
"Lettard deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibella for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."
"Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."
"Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."
"Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."
"Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."

languages.text: « Forius méritait de mourir, et je refuse de punir Kibellah pour l'avoir tué. Quant à ses pratiques, elles sont désormais interdites à bord de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."

traits.locale_text: « Forius méritait de mourir, et je refuse de punir Kibellah pour l'avoir tué. Quant à ses pratiques, elles sont désormais interdites à bord de ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: «Forius merecía morir y no condenaré a Kibellah por su asesinato. En cuanto a sus prácticas, desde ahora quedan prohibidas en mi nave».
languages.original_text: "Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."

traits.locale_text: «Forius merecía morir y no condenaré a Kibellah por su asesinato. En cuanto a sus prácticas, desde ahora quedan prohibidas en mi nave».

languages.text: 「フォーリアスは死んで当然だ。その罪でキベラを罰するつもりはない。彼のやり方はこれ以降、この船では禁止とする」
languages.original_text: "Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."

traits.locale_text: 「フォーリアスは死んで当然だ。その罪でキベラを罰するつもりはない。彼のやり方はこれ以降、この船では禁止とする」

languages.text: “弗里乌斯罪有应得，我不会因为谋杀行为而惩罚绮贝菈。至于弗里乌斯做过的事情，这艘船上以后一律禁止。”
languages.original_text: "Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."

traits.locale_text: “弗里乌斯罪有应得，我不会因为谋杀行为而惩罚绮贝菈。至于弗里乌斯做过的事情，这艘船上以后一律禁止。”

languages.text: "Forius hatte den Tod verdient, und ich werde Kibellah für diesen Mord nicht bestrafen. Was seine Praktiken angeht, sie sind ab sofort auf diesem Schiff verboten."
languages.original_text: "Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."

traits.locale_text: "Forius hatte den Tod verdient, und ich werde Kibellah für diesen Mord nicht bestrafen. Was seine Praktiken angeht, sie sind ab sofort auf diesem Schiff verboten."

languages.text: "Forius ölmeyi hak etti. Bense bu cinayet için Kibellah'yı cezalandırmayacağım. Forius'un uygulamalarına gelirsek... Bugünden itibaren bu gemide tamamını yasaklıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Forius deserved to die, and I am not going to punish Kibellah for that murder. As for his practices, they are henceforth banned on this ship."
